A

addWebMethods(String) - Static method in class apps.Service
Add web methods add to a hash map all methods of all classes with the @web annotation.
apps - package apps
 

C

contentResponse(File, BufferedOutputStream) - Static method in class apps.HttpServer
Content response send to the client the file or thing that was requested.
Controller - Class in apps
Controller class allows to init the web services.

G

getService() - Static method in class apps.Controller
Get the service of the session.

H

Handler - Interface in apps
Handler interface has all functions to handler a request.
headerResponse(PrintWriter, File, String, String) - Static method in class apps.HttpServer
Header response creates the response header to the request.
hello() - Static method in class apps.WebService
 
httpHandler(String[], PrintWriter, BufferedOutputStream) - Static method in class apps.HttpServer
Http handler allows to receive a request and process it to generate a response.
HttpServer - Class in apps
Big Http Server implements a web server that can return html, images and other files.
HttpServer() - Constructor for class apps.HttpServer
 

I

init() - Static method in class apps.Service
Init fill the hash map with the handlers to all methods of each class in the classpath.

L

listen() - Static method in class apps.Service
When listen is execute, all the connections between server and client start and stay ready to receive requests.

M

main(String[]) - Static method in class apps.Controller
 

P

Process allows to execute the method that this handler is keeping.

S

Service - Class in apps
Service class allows to read every class and method that a developer creates and given a request be able to response correctly.

square(String) - Static method in class apps.WebService
 
StaticMethodHandler - Class in apps
StaticMethodHandler class is the implementation of the Handler interface.

W

Web - Annotation Type in apps
Web is the annotation used in the services created by the developers to read a request url from browser and allows them to response.
WebService - Class in apps
